channel.title: Hyperion 377 - Current Release: 1
channel.description:
The other day I was bored waiting for one my classes to start, and I thought to myself, "Why not convert Hyperion to 377? After all the client isn't nearly as broken as the 317." So I did just that. This release has nearly full player updating, a large sum of server->clients, and a decent start on client->server packets. I will be updating this release whenever I do more work on it, but for now I'm just going to release what I have. I will eventually add content and whatnot, but it'll be at my own pace when I'm not working on Zirconium.
Features: Full Player Updating, except for mask 0x100 (Syncing animation with movement, used in Agility.) A start to NPC Rendering, haven't added any masks. Server->Client Packets: 38 Client->Server Packets: 26
Media: [img]http://puu.sh/1AGdh.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1AGdL.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1AGed.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1AGfA.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1AGhu.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1AGpe.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1AGqh.png[/img]
Server Download: [URL=http://up.ht/SV8nco]377 Hyperion.rar - 28.8 MB[/URL]
Client Download: [URL=http://up.ht/SV8hkQ]377 Client.rar - 16.3 MB[/URL]
